full_summary:
### Tender Notice

**Title:** Keysight Spectrum Analyzer - Solicitation Number: W8486-238696/A

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement (SA)

**Notice Date:** September 19, 2023

**Closing Date:** October 5, 2023, at 14:00 EST

The Department of National Defence invites responses to an RFP for Keysight FieldFox Spectrum Analyzer with a Quantity of 2.

**Product Specifications:**

* Keysight FieldFox Spectrum Analyzer
* P/N: N9938A
* NSN: 6625 01-6294131
* OR EQUIVALENT

**Delivery Requirements:**

* Requested delivery date: February 28, 2024

**Eligibility Criteria:**

* Suppliers must hold a Supply Arrangement in series E60HN-16ELEC with Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC).
* Suppliers interested in becoming a qualified SA Holder for future requirements can contact PSPC at steve.dumaresq@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca.

**Instructions to Suppliers:**

* Only pre-qualified Suppliers have been invited to bid.
* Suppliers are required to submit their proposals in accordance with the solicitation document.

**Documents:**

* Solicitation Document (French and English): [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/9256/w8486-238696a-solicitation.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/9256/w8486-238696a-solicitation-fr.pdf)

**Contact Information:**

* Justin Laundrie, Acquisition Manager
* Telephone: 343-571-8929
* Email: [justin.laundrie@forces.gc.ca](mailto:justin.laundrie@forces.gc.ca)
* Address: Department of National Defence, 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON, Canada

Note: This entry is a tender notice and solicits responses from eligible suppliers.
